data.name: The Facility Project
data.detailed_description:
The Facility Project offers an epic horror-adventure crafted with a strong focus on atmosphere and story. Explore countless tenebrous environments, find your way throughout a towering facility, find evidence and solve a surreal mystery that will haunt you for years to come.

Features


○ Stunning graphics powered by Unity 3D.
○ A first-person system offering the best experience possible.
○ A mind-bending storyline.
○ The horror atmosphere and ambiance which convey the effect of presence and plunge into madness.
○ Intriguing challenges and puzzles rewarding your wit and observation.
○ Photo camera allowing you to capture the evidence.
○ Hidden objects that provide information about the experiments.

Q & A, Commonly asked question


What is the gameplay like?
As you search the facility, you must explore the environment, collect evidence, solve puzzles, challenges and avoid the creatures.

What platforms will the game be available on?
The game will initially be released on Windows.
There might be support for Mac and Linux further down the road if the Windows version does well enough.


How big is your team?
I am the only member (developing the game) of the core team

data.short_description: Adventure out in the abandoned facility equipped with only your photo camera and flashlight. Collect evidence, survive the terrifying creatures, and make it out alive!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-11100HE Processor or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 250 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

content_descriptors.notes: Includes mild violence and mild language.
